name: Lights Out (Jame Game 24)
description:
!! Performance seems to be worse on the web version, probly my spaghetti code :( !!

Invasive parasitic creatures have taken over the tower. What to do?

Burn them with fire.

A (really) short game created for Jame Gam 24 and made in Godot Game Engine.

This is my first attempt at a game jam let alone finishing a game.

Controls:

WASD & Space: Run and Jump

LMB: Grapple

ESC: Takes you to the menu

Soundtrack:
